text: sweet potatoes are such a nutrient-rich
vegetable I often wonder why I'm not
eating them for every meal but this is a
really simple delicious salad featuring
sweet potatoes and farro one of my
favorite whole grains we're going to
roast them and toss it with warm farro
some fresh dill lemon delicious so I
have four sweet potatoes here that I'm
just chopping up into about one inch
sized pieces
no transfer these to two rimmed baking
sheets really important when you're
roasting vegetables to give them the
space they need and this will make sure
that they don't steam they roast and
caramelize and they form that really
beautiful delicious crispy crust one
sweet potato has your entire serving of
vitamin A in the day vitamin A is really
great for complexions so let's toss
these guys with olive oil salt and
pepper we're going to also include three
cloves of garlic these are going to
roast whole and become just really
meltingly sweet and tender I have the
oven up at 450 and they're going to cook
for about 30 minutes or so until they're
tender and caramelized the roasted sweet
potatoes and garlic have cooled slightly
what I'm going to do is prepare the
dressing just flip the skins off of
these gently mash the garlic we're going
to zest one lemon I always like to zest
right into the bowl ooh this garlic and
lemon smells so nice now let's just go
for the juice as well shooting for about
a quarter cup should be enough in one
large lemon like this now to finish our
dressing we're just going to whisk in a
little bit of olive oil we're shooting
for about two tablespoons here all right
so let's season this with a little bit
of salt pepper chop up a little bit of
dill I have half a cup here give this a
whisk mmm silly I've cooked one cup of
farro for about 35 minutes until it's
nice and tender you can see the kernels
have just
started to crack open like this it's
great to add your whole-grain slightly
warm to a dressing because it helps the
dressing really permeate the grain all
right now it's time to add delicious
roasted sweet potatoes second tray here
for the finishing touch I'm adding half
a cup of sunflower shoots hearty crunchy
they have a nice sweetness I think they
even sort of have like an almond D
flavor yum yum
this looks totally delicious just what
you want to dig into for lunch
let's give it a try hmm loving the
garlic in here this roasted sweet potato
and farro salad will keep you satisfied
